```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Exam 1 grades for 8am Class.

```{r echo=FALSE}

Class1 <- c(93,100,92,90,95,99,90,98,98,95,95,96,94,100,84,82,85,89,84,82,78,75,70,70,63,54,51)


p <- ggplot(data = data.frame(Class1), aes(x = Class1)) + 
  geom_density(fill = "lightblue1") + 
  theme_bw() + 
  labs(x = "Exam 1 grades") +
  geom_vline(xintercept=mean(Class1), linetype="dotted") +
  annotate("text",x=mean(Class1)+1,y=0.01,label="Exam Average = 86",hjust=0)

ggplotly(p)

```
